name: CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_Documents
description: Rule containing data for Fraudulent Transactions documents.Table:CMGT_EXT_DATA_Documents
sail_code:
/*The below is the structure definition of the map used in this rule*/
/*a!map(
name:Defines the display name of the document,
referenceName: should match the name of the Appian Document, needs to have the app prefix for cloning
description:Defines description of the document
caseTitle:Case title to which the document should be mapped
 */
 a!localVariables(
   local!maps:{
     /*Fraudulent Transactions  */
     /*Credit Card Disputes  */
     a!map(
       name: "Restaurant Bill",
       description: "Photo of the original bill from the restaurant showing the correct amount.",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Consumer Regulatory",
       description: "Document focuses on the implementation and compliance with consumer protection laws and regulations.",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Chargeback Guide",
       description: "A guide to help you understand the chargeback process",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Affidavit",
       description: "A written statement confirmed by oath or affirmation, for use as evidence in court.",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Credit Card Transactions",
       description: "Capture a screenshot or photo of the credit card statement highlighting the incorrect charge",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Payment Authorization",
       description: "Statement or report presenting the financial status, transactions, or assets related.",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Credit Card Dispute Form",
       description: "Form that details the dispute, including the correct and incorrect amounts, and any relevant transaction details.",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Receipt",
       description: "Receipt provided by the restaurant at the time of purchase, showing the correct amount.",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Incorrect Amount Charged - Reevalutaion Report",
       description: "This report aims to confirm or refute initial suspicions, provide updated insights, and recommend actions based on the latest data and findings.",
       caseTitle: "Incorrect Amount Charged"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Duplicate Transaction Letters",
       description: "A formal dispute letter addressed to your credit card issuer or bank, outlining the details of the duplicate transactions and requesting resolution.",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Consumer Regulatory",
       description: "Document focuses on the implementation and compliance with consumer protection laws and regulations.",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Chargeback Guide",
       description: "A guide to help you understand the chargeback process",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Affidavit",
       description: "A written statement confirmed by oath or affirmation, for use as evidence in court.",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Duplicate Transaction Bank Statement",
       description: "A copy of your bank statement showing the outgoing payment transaction, including the date, amount, and recipient details",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Duplicate Transaction Receipts",
       description: "Photo of the original transaction receipt showing the correct amount.",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Dispute Claim",
       description: "Details the dispute, including the correct and incorrect amounts, and any relevant transaction details and the claim",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Card Dispute Letter",
       description: "A letter notice to a card company about a problem with a charge",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Duplicate Transaction - Reevalutaion Report",
       description: "This report aims to confirm or refute initial suspicions, provide updated insights, and recommend actions based on the latest data and findings.",
       caseTitle: "Duplicate Transaction"
     ),
     /*Automated Clearing House*/
     a!map(
       name: "Bank Statement",
       description: "Record of the balance in a bank account and the amounts that have been paid into it and withdrawn from it, issued periodically to the holder of the account.",
       caseTitle: "ACH Payment Not Received"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Invoice",
       description: "Document that records the products or services delivered to the customer, the total amount due, and the preferred payment method.",
       caseTitle: "ACH Payment Not Received"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Payment Not Received Bank receipt",
       description: "Bank receipt having enough proof that the payment is not received",
       caseTitle: "ACH Payment Not Received"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Payment Not Received Letter",
       description: "Letter of complaint for the payment not received issue",
       caseTitle: "ACH Payment Not Received"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Payment Not Received Business Account Statement",
       description: "Bank receipt of business account having enough proof that the payment is not received",
       caseTitle: "ACH Payment Not Received"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "ACH Payment Not Received - Reevalutaion Report",
       description: "This report aims to confirm or refute initial suspicions, provide updated insights, and recommend actions based on the latest data and findings.",
       caseTitle: "ACH Payment Not Received"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Transaction Error From Site",
       description: "Screenshot from site highlighting the transaction error",
       caseTitle: "ACH Transaction Error"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Transaction Error Screenshot From Mobile",
       description: "Screenshot from mobile highlighting the transaction error",
       caseTitle: "ACH Transaction Error"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Authorization Form",
       description: " A document that is duly endorsed by an individual or organisation which grants permission to another individual or organisation to proceed with certain actions",
       caseTitle: "ACH Transaction Error"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Transaction History",
       description: "A record of financial undertakings made with a credit card that fall within a specified time period",
       caseTitle: "ACH Transaction Error"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "Cardholder Transaction Dispute Form",
       description: "Document that allows cardholders to officially report and dispute unauthorized or incorrect transactions on their credit or debit cards",
       caseTitle: "ACH Transaction Error"
     ),
     a!map(
       name: "ACH Transaction Error - Reevalutaion Report",
       description: "This report aims to confirm or refute initial suspicions, provide updated insights, and recommend actions based on the latest data and findings.",
       caseTitle: "ACH Transaction Error"
     ),
   },
   #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
     local!maps,
     #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
       fv!item,
       "referenceName",
       concat(cons!CMGT_EXT_TXT_APP_PREFIX," ",fv!item.name)
     )
 )
 )
